body.name: HAAGEEP Queen Bed Frame 18 Inch High Bedframe Tall No Box Spring Needed with Storage Metal Platform Size
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 13 mins
features: ✔ HEAVY DUTY: Strong frame with sturdy steel slat structure, no squeak noise free, good sleep
✔ NO BOXSPRING: Match standard size twin full queen king size mattress, no box spring need
✔ WITH STORAGE: 18 inch high platform bed frames with 16 inch of ample under bed storage
✔ NON-SLIP: Frame enclose the mattress to prevent slipping, with headboard hole to attach headboard
✔ EASY ASSEMBLE: No tools required, quick and easy to assemble, 5 year warranty guarantee
✔ PATENT HOLDING: Our product holds a Patent with the number YKC-3US0090.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fit and Secure Standard Mattress HAAGEEP bed frame is designed to fit standard mattresses, and made refinement to prevent mattress slide.Mattress is inseted into this bed frame with 0.6 inches depth and slightly smaller inner dimensions.Lightly push your mattress into our bed frame as if building blocks. Say goodbye to annoying mattress shifts. Product Information Bed Frame Size: ‎Queen, ‎81.5 x 61.5 x 18 inchesInner Dimensions for Secure Mattress: 79.5 x 59.5 x 0.6 inchesCompatible Mattress: Queen Mattresses, 80 x 60 inchesWeight Capacity: 1600 PoundsHeadboard Holes: YES

Ample Storage and Easy Cleaning Standing at 18 inches in height, HAAGEEP bed frame boasts a generous storage space underneath.Thoughtful height is designed for easy cleaning, ensuring that your floor remains clean and hygienic.Ample storage area is easily accessible, makes storing and retrieving items a breeze. Needs of under-bed storage After moving into a smaller room, perhaps you need more storage space.Closet doesn't have enough space for excess or big items, HAAGEEP could help add extra storage space.Clean bedding has nowhere to be placed, you can store it under our bed frame.Give your pet a place to rest and play by clearing some space under the bed frame.When someone comes home with a big suitcase, you can temporarily keep it under the bed frame.

Incredibly Strong and Sturdy HAAGEEP bed frame able to support up to 1600 pounds. 7 legs construction and heavy-duty steel provide reliable stability.Feel free to jump on your bed. Our frame is built to handle it. Headboard Holes and Other Features Headboard holes are provided by this bed frame, adding style to your bedroom with your own headboard.HAAGEEP bed frame are equipped with specially designed foot pads for wooden floors.To ensure mattress longevity and comfortable sleep, our bed frame focus on proper slat spacing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FAST EASY ASSEMBLY-STURDY!
reviews.reviewText: My fiancé and I were looking for something simple, modern, and easy to put together. Fully exceeded my expectations!! We assembled in 20 minutes (no arguing lol) I cannot stress enough how easy and fast it was to put together. Very straight forward. Minimal parts. Headache free! No squeaking, no movement, no shaking, COMPLETELY STURDY!! Great quality! The height is also perfect for us. We’re both pretty short and didn’t want something too heigh. Plenty of space for storage underneath which we need for our small apartment! Simply a great and affordable purchase- get this frame!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy platform bed.
reviews.reviewText: The bed was super easy to put together. It’s nice and sturdy and I love how high up it is easy to put storage under the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Awesome for storage
reviews.reviewText: I like the height of this frame, im able to store several plastic tubs underneath and it is very easy to assemble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had for 2 years and still strong
reviews.reviewText: I got this bed to sort of hold me over until I found something to fit the “aesthetic” I was going for but honestly I’ve been so impressed that I stopped looking for something different. It’s sturdy and strong, I was a little bit hesitant since there is only one center support but like I said, it’s definitely withstood pretty good wear! It isn’t completely silent, I don’t want to mislead you, but it’s not even close to loud. The height is perfect, it looks elevated in the room and you can fit storage totes underneath! We have the king

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Product except for the sharp corners
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame has a lot of pluses. The only thing that I do not like so much is the sharp corners that protrude at the foot of the bed. Already I have banged my leg on it a couple of times after only having it for a few days. Aside from that, it is a great bed frame.What I liked:- no middle leg at the foot of the bed - love this!- very sturdy and easy to assemble - all parts fit well- pre-drilled for headboard attachment- good price and a great value- looks great and is so much easier to clean under the bed now- love the 18" height- loved saying goodbye to my old frame and clunky box springDid not like so much:- sharp corners at the foot of the bed (ouch!)- the length of the frame could be a bit shorter for a queen mattress; I pulled my mattress as far as I could toward the foot to lessen the sharp corner hazard but still, my knee collided with the corner- would greatly prefer rounded corners at the foot- took MONTHS before my order arrived

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy enough to assemble and creates lots of under the bed storage
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame took under 30 minutes to assemble, is solid, high quality (holes aligned, screws worked, everything was in box), and arrived on time. The box is heavy, though. One thing I wasn't keen about is that instructions say to use a power driver to tighten the screws to prevent squeaking however it's a hex head, and I didn't have those bits for my driver. But I don't hear squeaking. Aside from that I'm thoroughly pleased with the product, and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: We have now bought 2 of these! Sturdy and so easy to put together! It’s also great to have the extra storage underneath!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and easy to put together! Took my boyfriend and I maybe 10 minutes. The longest part is putting the metal bars in.Lots of room under the bed! So lots of storage!!
